  • Implement an Ad Unit

Implement an Ad Unit¶

Once you’ve verified your integration with the Integration Helper, follow our integration guides and implement our Ad Units.
You can choose between :
- Optin Video
- Interstitials.

If you are using a mediation and want to implement our ad units through them, you can follow our integration guides for Mediations.
